title: Word Capitalization
description:
Capitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter. Your task is to capitalize the given word.
Note, that during capitalization all the letters except the first one remains unchanged.
input_specification: A single line contains a non-empty word. This word consists of lowercase and uppercase English letters. The length of the word will not exceed 103.
output_specification: Output the given word after capitalization.
